name: Ship Retrieval Service [Global Game Jam 2021][PL]
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2021 - Lost and Found

Polish language only (but it's not like there's a lot of text and some of it is in another language on purpose). For best experience play in fullscreen mode.

A pleasant game about uncovering lost ships from centuries ago.

Sit comfy on the deck, sip your coffee while you listen to your favorite classical music and read through the old journals.
Who knows what will you find in the ocean depths.

GAMEPLAY:

Read through the books to track ship's route and find a place where it was lost.
Use the map to select a location where you want to search for the wreckage.
Launch the engine and send an expedition.

CONTROLS:
ESC - Exit game
R - Restart game
While inspecting books, you can zoom-in and zoom-out using Scroll Wheel. Additionally, you can move them up and down, if you hold Right Mouse Button and Scroll Wheel.
